description: Provide technical support to the Ministry to obtain a more decentralized governance system for greater effectiveness and efficiency

subproject.corporate outcome: Local Government Reform process increases participation of public in decision making process at the local level
subproject.description:
Identification of of Functions and responsibilities of Local Government Bodies
Development of a functional framework for Local Government 
Draft Legislative Framework and provisions to give effect to the local Government Reform Policy , prescriptions and progammes
Transfer of best practices to Ministry Personnel through the UNV modality
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: MOLG Inst Streng
